title: ‘Fat Ham’ Review: To BBQ or Not to BBQ
sub_head: James Ijames’s riff on ‘Hamlet,’ fresh off winning a Pulitzer Prize, is an unalloyed comedy pleasure.
body:
New York
‘Fat Ham,” James Ijames’s uproarious comic riff on “Hamlet,” arrives in New York trailing baggage. Not such bad baggage: The play was just awarded the Pulitzer Prize for drama. This is the theatrical equivalent of a full set of Louis Vuitton luggage stuffed with freshly bought couture.
